Package ifsul.edu.br

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ifsul.edu.br.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class Server
extends Thread
    Classe executa o servidor que ira executar a agencia bancaria e mostrar as mensagens para os cliente e administradores
    Author:
    Igor Rocha
